showScoreExcerpt:
“Thematically, you might say ‘I Need That’ deals with the human capacity to become mired in the past, the present, or the future...In true Rebeck fashion, a couple of surprising revelations are sprung on us out of the blue, along with a hopeful ending that more-or-less sorts things out. But because the plot consists of a conglomeration of barely examined ideas, the whole fails to satisfy beyond the comedic stylings of Danny DeVito.”
